long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
3 Elephants is a browser extension that supports eco-conscious behavior on Amazon. It does the following:

* Encourages you to choose shipping options with a low carbon footprint.
* Rates and labels products and their brands by how green 3rd party sources say they are. We also identify health risks.
* Tells you what data sources are behind the rating, and allows you to look at this detailed information directly. We also tell you the credibility of the rating.
* Sorts Amazon search results by our ratings
* Encourages no-rush shipping

We rate FASHION, COSMETICS, ELECTRONICS, and FOOD ITEMS. (Categories in progress: Automotive)

**Disclaimer: we try to be transparent since we can't be hundred percent accurate all the time. But we still believe that this can genuinely lower your footprint; if you'd like to know more about why - email us!**
